readable.title: 2085726719_a57a75dbe5
readable.content: Two girls bundled up in winter coats pose for a picture . Two girls holding drinks and looking at something on a cellphone . Two teen girls are looking at a small electronic device while wearing winter coats . Two women dressed for cold weather in jackets and gloves look at something on a cellphone screen . Two young girls huddle to look at a cellphone .
